translations: [物化]偶极；[物]偶极子（dipole 的复数）；偶极天线

sentences.sentence: Dipoles, Quadrupoles. Azimuthal Symmetry. Magnetostatics, Charge Conservation and Magnetic Force.
sentences.translation: 偶极，四极。方位角对称。静磁，带电量守恒及磁力。

sentences.sentence: All of these electric dipoles are randomly oriented-like countless compass needles pointing every which way.
sentences.translation: 所有这些电偶极子随机排列———象无数指向四面八方的罗盘针。

sentences.sentence: According to theory, there are countless electric dipoles created by virtual particles in any given volume of the quantum vacuum.
sentences.translation: 这个理论告诉我们，在任何给定体积的量子真空中都存在数不清的由虚粒子产生的电偶极子。
